data.name: Alice
data.text:
中微
Hal R. Varian: Intermediate Microeconomics A Modern Approach. 8th Edition W.W. 
Norton & Company. New York, NY. 2010.
和
Theodore C. Bergstrom and Hal R. Varian: Workouts in Intermediate 
Microeconomics. 8th Edition W.W. Norton & Company. New York, NY. 2010.
中宏
Mankiw, N. Gregory, “Macroeconomics”, Worth Publishers, 8th edition, 2012 (Main)

data.name: Bob
data.text: Re Alice: 这些是都要买、都要看的吗

data.name: Alice
data.text:
Re Bob: 中微workout得做，教材可能有助于加强理解吧，但cz觉得老师讲得很清楚所以没看过
中宏教材同理

post.text: 求问：经管的中微和中宏有教材吗？要买哪本书吗？
